epilepsy-planning-tool.title: Epilepsy Planning Tool
epilepsy-planning-tool.description: Optimization of an interactive simulation tool for planning epilepsy therapies; enhanced platform independence, improved data visualization, and significantly increased stability of FEM-based electrical field simulations.

portfolio-website.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio-website.description: A personal portfolio website built with NextJS and TailwindCSS to showcase projects and experiences.

virtual-patient-cohorts.title: Virtual Patient Cohorts
virtual-patient-cohorts.description: Development of a Python application for adapting mathematical models to real medical data; enables efficient analysis of therapy effects and generation of virtual patient data for simulation-based research.

field-consistent-glyphs.title: Field-Consistent Glyphs
field-consistent-glyphs.description: Implementation of a ParaView plugin for field-consistent visualization of vector and tensor fields; improves the expressiveness of scientific visualizations by correctly representing local field patterns in complex data structures.
